mapper.select: select pk_BomListId, e.pk_TypeSpanId, r.ts_TypeSpan, bl_HardwareNumber, bl_HardwareVersion, bl_FirmwareNumber, bl_FirmwareVersion, bl_ForceUpdate, bl_FileMd5, bl_Updatedate from tbl_bomlist e left join tbl_TypeSpan r on r.pk_TypeSpanId = e.pk_TypeSpanId

select pk_BomListId, pk_TypeSpanId, bl_HardwareNumber, bl_HardwareVersion, bl_FirmwareNumber, bl_FirmwareVersion, bl_ForceUpdate, bl_FileMd5, bl_Updatedate from tbl_bomlist where pk_TypeSpanId = #{Id}
select pk_BomListId, pk_TypeSpanId, bl_HardwareNumber, bl_HardwareVersion, bl_FirmwareNumber, bl_FirmwareVersion, bl_ForceUpdate, bl_FileMd5, bl_Updatedate from tbl_bomlist where pk_BomListId = #{Id}

select pk_BomListId, pk_TypeSpanId, bl_HardwareNumber, bl_HardwareVersion, bl_FirmwareNumber, bl_FirmwareVersion, bl_ForceUpdate, bl_FileMd5, bl_Updatedate from tbl_bomlist b inner join tbl_equipmentversion e on b.bl_HardwareNumber = e.ev_HardwareNumber and b.bl_HardwareVersion = e.ev_HardwareVersion and b.bl_FirmwareNumber = e.ev_FirmwareNumber and b.bl_FirmwareVersion = e.ev_FirmwareVersion where pk_TypeSpanId = #{typeSpanId} and e.ev_ProductID = #{productId} and e.ev_ProductType = 3
